episodes.title: Minisode 110: Is The Keto Diet The Secret To Beating Mental Illness?
episodes.description: Ketogenic diet for mental health: Truth or Hype? Learn about the keto diet and its impact on conditions like depression, bipolar disorder, and schizophrenia.Is The Keto Diet The Secret To Beating Mental Illness? Many people with mental health problems have metabolic issues. Could a low-carb, high-fat diet like keto help? We explain the science, possible benefits, and the significant risks you must know. 🚨 🧠 For all things mental health from Dr. Sulman Aziz Mirza 👉🏼 https://linktr.ee/sulmanazizmirzamd This video is about TOPIC and mental health and psychiatry, as part of our series on mental health and psychiatry. episodes.title: Scientology's Hidden Influence EXPOSED
episodes.description:
Imagine seeking help for addiction, only to find yourself unknowingly involved with Scientology. How does this happen? Join Dr. Sulman Aziz Mirza as he uncovers Scientology's network of seemingly helpful organizations. From drug rehabilitation to mental health advocacy, these groups appear beneficial on the surface. But a darker truth lies beneath. What happens when a cult takes over its own watchdog? The story of the Cult Awareness Network's transformation will leave you questioning everything you thought you knew about seeking help.

Chapters
0:00 Intro
1:10 ABLE - The Association for Better Living & Education
2:20 Narconon & Criminon
5:45 CCHR - Citizens Commission on Human Rights
9:10 CAN - The Cult Awareness Network
11:50 Beware of hidden influences

episodes.title: Minisode 84: What Do Scientologists Actually Believe?
episodes.description: Uncover the shocking truth behind Scientology in this eye-opening exposé. From its alien-based beliefs to the costly "Bridge to Total Freedom," we delve deep into the secretive world of L. Ron Hubbard's controversial organization. Discover how Scientology's war on mental health puts its members at risk and learn about the dangerous tactics used to control and suppress critics. We explore the celebrity façade that masks a complex web of legal battles and controversies. This video reveals the real cost of Scientology - not just in dollars, but in its toll on relationships and mental well-being. We examine the organization's aggressive "fair game" policy and its impact on former members and critics. Join us as we unravel the mysteries of Scientology's alien teachings, celebrity recruitment strategies, and questionable auditing practices. Learn why mental health professionals are concerned about Scientology's stance on psychiatry and how it affects vulnerable individuals. Whether you're curious about cult tactics or interested in religious controversies, this video provides an in-depth look at one of the most talked-about organizations in modern times. Don't miss this crucial exploration of Scientology's hidden truths and the dangers that lurk beneath its polished exterior. Like, subscribe, and share to help spread awareness about the realities of Scientology. Stay tuned for more videos in this series, including how Scientology operates under different guises to promote its belief system. #Scientology #CultExposé #ReligiousControversy #MentalHealthAwareness #CelebrityScientologists Chapters 0:00 Intro 1:25 The Bridge to Total Freedom 4:05 The war on psychiatry 7:20 Control & suppression 10:23 Project Celebrity 12:30 The real cost Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

episodes.title: L Ron Hubbard's Dangerous Legacy EXPOSED
episodes.description:
To learn more about the dangerous legacy of L. Ron Hubbard and the scientology founder being exposed, please visit our YouTube channel. 

This video also covers:

- The story of L Ron Hubbard
- Who founded scientology?
- What do scientologists believe?

**************************

L Ron Hubbard's Dangerous Legacy EXPOSED

Dive into the enigmatic world of L. Ron Hubbard, the controversial founder of Scientology. This video explores Hubbard's journey from struggling science fiction writer to religious leader, uncovering the truth behind his exaggerated military career and involvement in occult practices.

Discover how Hubbard's creation of Dianetics evolved into Scientology, a religion that continues to spark debate worldwide. We examine Scientology's anti-psychiatry stance and its impact on mental health discussions, as well as the organization's treatment of critics and former members.

Learn about Hubbard's manipulation tactics and the lasting legacy of his teachings within Scientology. From his early days as a pulp fiction author to his role as "Source" in a global religious movement, this video provides a comprehensive look at L. Ron Hubbard's controversial life and the birth of Scientology.

Whether you're curious about cults, alternative religions, or the intersection of science fiction and spirituality, this video offers valuable insights into one of the most polarizing figures in modern religious history.

#LRonHubbard #Scientology #Dianetics #Cults #MentalHealth #ReligiousControversy #ScienceFiction #Psychiatry #ScientologyFounder #ReligiousManipulation

Chapters

0:00 Intro
1:20 L Ron Hubbard's writing background
3:52 Hubbard's controversial background
6:30 Finding Scientology
8:59 A legacy of lies
11:35 The lasting impact of Hubbard

episodes.title: Vote Now! Is Professor X a Hero...or a Cult Leader?
episodes.description:

Uncover the controversial truth behind Charles Xavier's leadership in the X-Men, with Dr Sulman Aziz Mirza, MD using the principles of psychology behind cults and cult leaders!
